articlesData.name: 5 STAR SERVICE
articlesData.author: Tina McKinsley
articlesData.shortContent: Vacation rentals offer a remarkably simple source for extra income with the right management. My experience has been fantastic with Okanagan Vacation Rentals and our 2 bedroom unit has 5 star rating which means we are the first in Air-bnb and VRBO searches. I have seen a 3x increase in revenue with vacation rentals since the switch from traditional rental and with carefully selected tenants Okanagan Getaways ensures respectable tenants stay in my suite.
